issues.description: The solutionâ€™s PersonScene view class declares and imports a PersonService attribute, directly violating the MVC layering described in the problem (the view should only interact with PersonController). This extra service field is never initialized or used, breaking the intended design and preventing the view from compiling and running correctly.
issues.suggested_fix: Remove the PersonService import and field declaration from PersonScene. The view should use only the provided PersonController for all interactions, consistent with the MVC design.
